nodes.text: The Battle of Hettsk was a battle of the Thrawn campaign. The Galactic Empire captured the planet planet Hettsk.

In 9 ABY, the Galactic Empire and the New Republic engaged in a massive space and ground battle on the planet Hettsk, in the Borderland Regions. The Imperial forces won the day, and captured two New Republic pilots in the process: Wing Commander Greni and her wingmate Bross, both of Gold Squadron.
The Page's Commandos were soon after sent on a mission to rescue Greni and Bross, and were successful.
